TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的簽章類別可透過訊息內容或簽章。The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. 第二種類型的簽章指*副署*。The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是說，簽章可以簽署，形成副署簽章，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 這個類別並沒有公用建構函式。因此，它不會公開執行個體化。This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. 它是唯讀狀態類別從存取屬性。It is a read-only class accessible from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

summary.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.
An object that represents the signing certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果簽章的憑證就不會包含在簽入時間使用屬性，則憑證不會傳回。If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the property, then the certificate will not be returned.

summary.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the **HashOnly** member of the enumeration when setting up a object.

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the **HashOnly** member of the enumeration when setting up a object.

summary.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

span.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不提供驗證的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊。This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

span.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更複雜的驗證，呼叫端可以指定只有簽章驗證，然後使用物件來執行自訂驗證。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更複雜的驗證，呼叫端可以指定只有簽章驗證，然後使用物件來執行自訂驗證。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeCounterSignature() cil managed

summary.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是說，簽章可以簽署，形成副署簽章，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 這個方法會顯示您可以在其中選擇這個訊息的簽署人的使用者介面。This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. 這需要目前的處理序正在執行*使用者互動模式*，亦即，屬性設定為`true`。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 處理程序通常是使用者互動模式中除非它是服務處理程序或 Web 應用程式內執行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 簽署人的憑證符合下列條件將會顯示在清單中：Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - 憑證具有相關聯的私密金鑰。The certificate has an associated private key. - 憑證是在其有效期間內。The certificate is within its validity period. - 憑證具有不金鑰使用方法 」 或 「 支援數位簽章或不可否認性的金鑰使用方式。The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. 簽章者憑證選擇從我的存放區。Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 若要顯示使用者介面需要下列權限：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 存取簽章金鑰所需的下列權限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

summary.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

span.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

value.span: A表示帶正負號的屬性集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the signed attributes.

value.span: 如果有不帶正負號的屬性，屬性是空的集合。

span.span: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帶正負號的屬性可能會包含在範例集合擷取屬性是簽署時間屬性。An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. 帶正負號的屬性已簽署的其餘部分一起訊息內容。Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content. 這表示已成功驗證的簽章的合作對象可以有信心，這些屬性的內容是真確，和未被改變。This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered. A物件和物件自動產生並放在屬性每當對應簽署者的屬性不是空白。A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property whenever the property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerIdentifier As SubjectIdentifier

summary.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

value.span: A唯一識別的憑證，簽署人資訊與相關聯的物件。

span.span: A object that uniquely identifies the certificate associated with the signer information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnsignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

summary.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

span.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

value.span: A表示不帶正負號的屬性集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the unsigned attributes.

value.span: 如果有任何不帶正負號的屬性，屬性是空的集合。

span.span: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不帶正負號的屬性未簽署的其餘部分一起訊息內容。Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the message content. 即使合作對象已順利驗證簽章，不帶正負號的屬性可能已遭修改，而且不應視為真實性或完整性。Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity. 不帶正負號的屬性可能會包含在範例集合擷取屬性是副署簽章。An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

span.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

value.span: 整數值，指定的簽署人資訊版本。

span.span: An int value that specifies the signer information version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是較新的 PKCS #7 超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
